physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:94 x 148 mmCondition:The print is in good condition, though the mounting paper is heavily foxed and crumbling.Foliation:‘24’Process:Silver gelatin

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject MatterView of Bushire. The shoreline extends from right to distant left, lined with two-storey buildings. A particularly ornate balcony is visible at far right.In the distant background at left a dhow can be seenInscriptionsInk, below image: 'Bushire Coast Line.'Pencil, lower right, alongside image: ‘24’
